name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked as spam and excluded. asherdan: What a douche. (reported by Sakana, chatterjee, Magb)

name: untilyouaresonude
text:
Heh! Yeah! I mean, that couldn't have been the point.

If this comic were a vegan restaurant, you'd be the guy with the dry-erase marker and no intention on leaving a tip.

name: saint
text: ...because he's an asshole.

name: asherdan

name: karljw
text: so what you're saying is gay sex = evil? maybe you meant a word other than "sinister."

text: gay sex = left-handed

name: overmedicated
text: Wait, I equal gay sex? Explains a lot.

name: catachresis
text:
9/12. Missed out on Darth Vader, Ray's Drink and Punch man.
I am proud that I got the one about Pat right, though.

text: "Because he's an asshole" = 5

text: "His Vas Deferens" gets the 4

text: I think "because hes a dick" should get you partial marks at least.

text: Wow me too

name: chrissketch
text: This game really needs to be made. I would love to see all the random comic panels on the board.

name: professorhazard
text: I'm surprised nobody capitalized on the Free Achewood Tattoo event to get a tiebreaker tat of Roast Beef sleeping badly.

name: xiaomimi
text:

name: tommycrashwreck
text: I really enjoy your work.

name: unsentletter
text: Ahh, I love Trivial Pursuit.

name: missbee
text:
well i got 2 of the general knowledge ones....3 if "because he hates barbers" is close enough to "because he's an asshole"
man WHY didn't i get the bozack questions right?!

name: morypcaina
text: I don't really speak Spanish and my coworkers don't either, but I like to say "Piso mojado" a lot.

name: edana
text:
When I read the "General Knowledge" question on the third card my immediate reaction was "Ummm because he's an asshole?" Needless to say I was really proud of myself when I was exactly right.

(yes I realize everyone else forgot about this strip a year ago)
